verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I would have you to know, dearest brethren
And I speak without falseness or sham
That in Christ you are altogether beautiful
And I love you with all that I am.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
(Chorus)
So don't say you can't see the life in this
And don't show me the place where there's strife
For we're one and the same and I'm part of you
And without you I'd have no life.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Each day we are gathered together
And each day I may see you at your worst
But I find as I see through the eyes of faith
You become more like the One who loved me first.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
For now, I must look upon your nakedness
And for now, you must look upon mine
But as we are faithful to cover it
We'll be clothed in those garments divine
